futures.translation[0].definitions[0].de: goods, money, land etc that will be supplied or exchanged in the future at a time and price that has already been agreed
futures.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Corn futures prices rose as forecasts raised fears that the weather may damage the corn crop at a critical stage of its development.
Precious metals futures prices declined, with silver temporarily dropping below the critical $5-an-ounce level.
